mapper.update:
update cb_client
name = #{name},
uri = #{uri},
point_partner_no = #{pointPartnerNo},
openapi_partner_no = #{openapiPartnerNo},
order_display = #{orderDisplay},
appkey = #{appkey},
appsecret = #{appsecret},
bank_type = #{bankType},
bank_name = #{bankName},
qr_logo = #{qrLogo},
return_url = #{returnUrl},
remark = #{remark},
bank_id = #{bankId},
settle_pay_org = #{settlePayOrg},
bank_org = #{bankOrg},
bank_ZH = #{bankZH},
and id = #{id}
and client_id = #{clientId}
